text: Muttam or Muttom (മുട്ടം) may refer to: ==Places in India== * Muttom, Ernakulam, a district in Kerala and location of Muttom metro station * Muttam, Kannur, a district in Kerala * Muttom, Kanyakumari, a district in Tamil Nadu * Muttom, Thodupuzha, a district in Idukki, Kerala ==See also== * Muttampalam, a village in Kottayam district, Kerala
title: Muttam
